message.content:
cs.CR, cs.IR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SE 

The paper discusses the use of Distributed Ledger Technologies (DLTs) for secure and open federation of IoT platforms, which falls under the category of cryptography and security (cs.CR). The paper also mentions the use of data analytics and machine learning for the two real-life pilots, which falls under the category of information retrieval (cs.IR). The paper also discusses the use of IoT for electricity distribution grid balancing, which falls under the category of distributed, parallel, and cluster computing (cs.DC). The paper also mentions the use of IoT for guided electrical vehicle (EV) charging, which falls under the category of networking and internet architecture (cs.NI). Finally, the paper discusses the use of SOFIE to enable new functionality and business models, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
